text: On 24 July 2017, a suicide car bombing occurred in Kabul, Afghanistan.Kabul attack: Taliban claim suicide bomb that killed at least 35 in Afghanistan's capital It happened during morning rush hour in a Shia neighbourhood in the west of the city. The bomber rammed the car into the side of a bus which was transporting government employees to work. At least 35 people were killed and dozens of others injured. The bombing destroyed the bus, three other vehicles and several businesses. The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack. ==References== Category:2017 in Kabul
title: 24 July 2017 Kabul bombing
